responsibilities: Define and implement the SDK experience for all new API features and future versions of the API.
Build and maintain systems to streamline and automate SDK maintenance and generation.
Own the SDK strategy and roadmap, including language and feature support.
Collaborate closely with the API team, Developer Experience team, and GTM team to enhance SDKs.
skills: Ability to thrive and operate independently in a fast-paced environment with ambiguous requirements and goals.
Passion for building for other developers and incorporating feedback from users.
Engineering mindset with a willingness to engage in product decisions.
qualifications: Previous experience maintaining SDKs or building SDK generation software is beneficial but not necessary.
